 Get a pointer to the bitmap data of an Image:.

Detailed Description

Remarks:
TODO: The following methods exist in GDI+, but not AggOO (yet): Note that some of these use Windows objects, such as HDC and HWND. In order to implement these on other platforms, it will probably be necessary to create those structures in AggOO, or simply ignore them. We can use the preprocessor command if ( AGGOO_PLATFORM == AGGOO_PLATFORM_WIN32 ) to exclude them, or to specify that the local structures should be used.
